channel.title: math.AC updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.AC updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Bi-Lipschitz Quotient embedding for Euclidean Group actions on Data
item.description: arXiv:2409.06829v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: For the action of the orthogonal group or euclidean group on k-tuples of vectors we construct a bi-Lipschitz embedding from the orbit space into euclidean space.This embedding has distortion sqrt(2).
item.dc:creator: Harm Derksen

item.title: Segre products of cluster algebras
item.description: arXiv:2404.14872v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We show that under mild assumptions the Segre product of two graded cluster algebras has a natural cluster algebra structure.
item.dc:creator: Jan E. Grabowski, Lauren Hindmarch
